title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste! Aaj main aap sabse apni kala yatra ke baare mein baat karna chahti hoon.
Anushka: Bachpan mein, rangon se dosti ho gayi thi. Deewaron par bhi chala diye the, yaad hai!
Anushka: Phir school mein, ek teacher ne sahi rasta dikhaya.
Anushka: Unhone kaha, "Anushka, tumhari aankhon mein duniya alag dikhti hai."
Anushka: Us din se, maine socha, "Haan, mujhe yehi karna hai."
Anushka: Kuch paintings biki, kuch nahi. Par har painting ek naya sabaq tha.
Anushka: Akele mein canvas se baatein karti hoon. Shayad pagalpan hai, par yahi meri sachchai hai.
Anushka: Kala sirf rang nahi hai, doston. Ye dil ki baat hai, jo main aap tak pahunchana chahti hoon.
Anushka: Abhi toh shuruwat hai. Safar lamba hai, aur mujhe pata hai, aap sab mere saath hain. Shukriya!
